item.title: Meetup - Thursday 24th October 2019 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: We’re mixing things up again and holding the meetup on Thursday 24th Octoberat the ODI Node in Leeds for an evening of devops thoughts and experience sharing. 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:25 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:25 - 8:05 : From v1alpha1 to v1 - Kubernetes Operators 8:05 - 8:20 : Intermission 8:20 - 9:00 : The Dawning of a New Era - Auto Trader 9:00 - late : Social Our first speaker of the evening is Joshua Van Leeuwen from Jetstack, he’ll be giving a technical talk on kubernetes operators entilted “From v1alpha1 to v1 - how an operator turns 1.
